about.me: We are a professional Cardano staking pool build by an experienced DevOps team, with years of experience in supporting mission critical infrastructure in FinTech.
about.server: SAPIO Pool is hosted in a UK datacentre on our own hardware but we have some relays in the Cloud to get the best of both worlds.All our infrastrure is monitored and there are minimum 2 engineers on call at all times.
